document_data.name: Tiny
document_data.mainbody:
Brawler '''Tiny''' was a [[goblin]] [[Cult of the Absolute|cultist]] of [[the Absolute]] who dwelled the [[Shattered Sanctum]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|What're you starin' at? Think I'm small? Yer just a freak.|Tiny.}}
document_data.Description: Tiny had yellow skin and light brown hair she wore in small brains. She wore a crude leather harness, a necklace of anomal bones, and a hide-and-leather loincloth.
document_data.Personality: The diminutive goblin woman was somewhat sensitive about her height.
document_data.Possessions: She carried a crude, goblin-made [[scimitar]] into battle.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, cultists of the Absolute from the Shattered Sanctum launched a terrible raid on the [[Waukeen's Rest]] inn. Tiny was among the many goblins that celebrated their victory in a grand feast.
